title: Customer service
text: We set up an email account for my husbands Fitbit. After a few days it was deactivated. We sent an appeal and they said to get a code. When we tried to get the code it said the phone number had been used too many times. We have tried everything to get this settled. You can‚Äôt talk to a customer service representative about email. Now we have a Fitbit we can‚Äôt use and will have to return it. We are very unhappy with this situation. You would think a big company like this would have better customer service. Mobile device is iPad Pro with iOS 17.3.1.  Update: the last update installed on the iPad broke the app function for me.  It freezes and buttons are non responsive.
